response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its significance and the fact that it is worth $1,500,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can secure this remarkable item at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant savings of $300,000 compared to its full value, making it an exceptional deal for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
